name: The Sampler App Inc
description: Provider of self-serve digital product sampling services intended to make it targeted, measurable, and turnkey. The company's services include capturing demographic and behavioral insights on every product sample with easy-to-read results, enabling businesses to understand the consumer analytics and preferences behind the product.
one_liner: Provider of self-serve digital product sampling services intended to make it targeted, measurable, and turnkey.
